game.name: Cat Isle
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Catch a train to Cat Isle! In this cozy pixel art management game, build restaurants, expand and decorate the town. Figure out your cats needs as they dine, shop, explore and turn the island into their purfect home.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Catch a train to Cat Isle! In this cozy pixel art management game, build restaurants, expand and decorate the town. Figure out your cats needs as they dine, shop, explore and turn the island into their purfect home.
